anya-e0806n0:15_0: Icceva manavasesa mattano bhayādyūpaddavopaghābhakarasāmatthiya yogena sakalajjhattikabāhiyantarāya
anya-e0806n0:15_1: nivāraṇa madhippetasiddhi visesa mabhikaṅkhiya ratanattaya visayabhūtaṁ taṁsādhane
anya-e0806n0:15_2: kantanidāna bhūtassa ālokiyayātisayaguṇavisesayuttassa mahato pyatimahanīyassa ratanattayassa
anya-e0806n0:18: Vacanato attano gurupūjā purassaraṁ pañcikāvivaraṇaṁ pathi’yā pañcikā’tiādinā katapaṭiññattā sampati mahādayotiādino ganthassa sādhujanavaṇṇanaṁ vaṇṇanamārabhissāma.
anya-e0806n0:19_0: Nanu ca vuttiganthassa vaṇṇanāyaṁ katābhiniveso-yamācariyoti kathamihānadhikate mahādayotiādike
anya-e0806n0:19_4: parisamāpanatthaṁ. Vacīpaṇāmo panettha sotūnampi yathāvuttatthanipphādanako ācariyenāpyaya
anya-e0806n0:19_6: vacīpaṇāmoti kāyappaṇāmo manopaṇāmo ca. Na kato, ganthakattusandassanaṁ ganthassa
anya-e0806n0:19_9: vīmaṁsāpubbakārīnaṁ payojano pālambhapubbikā satthe pavattatīti sotujanasamussāhanaṁ
anya-e0806n0:20: Sabbasseva hi satthassa, kammassāpi ca kassaci;
anya-e0806n0:22: Nanu satthappayojanānaṁ sambandhopi vattabbo idamassa payojananti yato–
anya-e0806n0:27: Taṁ vuttantogadhattā na, bhinno vutto payojanāti.
anya-e0806n0:28: Payojanappayojanampana sāmatthiyaladdhabbaṁ sayamācariyena ‘‘ko pana saddalakkhaṇassa ajānane doso’’tiādinā vuttanayena viññātabbaṁ.
anya-e0806n0:29_2: vipulatthagā hiṁ anākula’nti ca imehi ganthārambhaphalaṁ sotujanasamussāhanañca,
anya-e0806n0:29_4: saṁvaṇṇīyati vivaritvā vitthāretvā kathīyati attho etāyāti saṁvaṇṇanābhi katvā, tampana
anya-e0806n0:29_5: vivaritvā kathanaṁ saddānusāsanasatthasannissayattā abhidheyyo nāma samuditena satthena
anya-e0806n0:30_0: Ayampanettha avayavattho-yoti aniyamavacanaṁ dhammarājasaddā pekkhāya cettha pulliṅgatā,
anya-e0806n0:30_1: tenettha vuccamānaguṇavisesā dhārapuggalavisesanidassanaṁ, dayati dukkhaṁ apanetvā
anya-e0806n0:30_2: paresaṁ sukhaṁ dadāti, dayīyati vā sappurisehi gamiya(ti sa) santāne pavattīyati,
anya-e0806n0:30_3: dayati vā paradukkhaṁ hiṁsati, dayati vā paradukkhaṁ gaṇhāti taṁvasena attano hadayakhedaṁ
anya-e0806n0:30_5: (5-49) appaccayo, visayamahantatāya mahatī pasatthā vā dayā assāti mahādayo, visesana
anya-e0806n0:30_7: hetuvacanaṁ, kammakilesehi janitāti janā sattaloko, iminā khīṇāsavāpi saṅgayhanti
anya-e0806n0:30_8: tesampi diṭṭhadhammikasukhavihārasaṅkhāta hitassa dānato, janānaṁ samūho janatā tassā
anya-e0806n0:30_10: hoti, assaca’sampūraya’nti iminā’dukkhamanubhavī’ti iminā ca sambandho, sambodhīti
anya-e0806n0:30_11: ettha saṁsaddo sāmanti imamatthaṁ dīpeti, tasmā saṁsayameva anaññabodhito hutvā cattāri
anya-e0806n0:30_12: saccāni bujjhati paṭivijjhati etāyāti sambodhi, saṁpubbā budhadhātuto ‘‘i’’iti ṇvādi
anya-e0806n0:30_14: vadanti, sampāpayatīti sampāpakaṁ, sambodhiyā sampāpakanti chaṭṭhīsamāso, kinti dhammajātaṁ
anya-e0806n0:30_15: dhammasaddenettha pāramidhammā pañcamahāpariccāgādayo ca adhippetā, tepi hi attānaṁ
anya-e0806n0:30_16: dhārentaṁ dhārenti sambodhi sampāpanasāmatthiyayogena parepi dhārenti nāmāti dhammāti
anya-e0806n0:30_17: vuccanti, ‘dhara=dhāraṇe’iccasmā khīsu, viyādisuttena ṇvādi(ko) mappaccayo, dhammānaṁjātaṁ,
anya-e0806n0:30_18: dhammāevavā jātaṁ, sambodhisampāpakañca taṁ dhammajātaṁ ceti visesanasamāso, ‘sampūraya’nti
anya-e0806n0:30_19: massetaṁ kammaṁ, sampūrayanti payogasampattiyogā dīpaṅkara (pāda)mūle hatthopagatampi
anya-e0806n0:30_22: sammā pūrento vaḍḍhento vuḍḍhiṁ virūḷhaṁ vepullaṁ gamentoti vuttaṁ hoti, hetuyevedamapi
anya-e0806n0:30_23: dukkhānubhavanassa, mahādayatā panassa paramparahetu, duṭṭhu khanati kāyikaṁ assādanti’dupubbā
anya-e0806n0:30_24: khanismā’ ‘‘kvī’’ti (5-4) kvi, dukkhaṁ kāyikadukkha vedanā, kīdisanti āha-’anantarūpa’nti,
anya-e0806n0:30_25: sabhāvavacano yaṁ rūpasaddo ‘‘piyarūpa’’ntiādīsuviya, te ca dukkhasabhāvā (anantā)
anya-e0806n0:30_26: anantakāraṇānaṁ vasena, tasmā anantaṁ rūpaṁ sabhāvo assāti anantarūpaṁ, taṁ dukkhaṁ
anya-e0806n0:30_27: anubhavī vindī, kimivāti āha-‘sukhaṁ vā’ti, suṭṭhu khanati kāyikaṁ ābādhanti sukhaṁ,
anya-e0806n0:30_29: sadhammattaṁ siyo pamā’’ti, kiṁ vuttaṁ hoti ‘‘aniṭṭhānubhavanasabhāvāyāpi dukkhavedanāya
anya-e0806n0:30_31: dukkhampi samānaṁ taṁ sukhamiva vindī’’ti. Kathamaññathā vaṭṭadukkhato sakalalokassa
anya-e0806n0:30_32: samuddharaṇaṁ siyāti, athavā sukhamiva sukhaṁ vindanto viya anaññavindiyamapi tādisaṁ
anya-e0806n0:30_33: dukkhaṁ sakalalokahitāva hitamanatāya vindīti attho, tenāha ‘akhinnarūpo’ti, akhinnaṁ
anya-e0806n0:31_0: Taṁ dhammarājanti yoti aniyamaniddiṭṭhassa vuttaguṇavisesādhāra puggalassaniyamanavacanaṁ,
anya-e0806n0:31_1: dhammena rājati no adhammenāti vā, attanā paṭividdhassa sāmibhāvena dhammassa rājā
anya-e0806n0:31_2: sāmīti vā, attanā paṭivijjhiyamāne dhamme paṭivijjhantova tattha rājati dippatīti
anya-e0806n0:31_3: vā, parūpakāravasena tadatthāyeva paṭipannattā paresaṁ dhammaṁ rājeti pakāsetīti
anya-e0806n0:31_4: vā dhammarājā, taṁ dhammarājaṁ namitvāti sambandho, namassitvāti attho, kīdisanti
anya-e0806n0:31_5: āha-‘jitamāravīraṁ sudhanta sovaṇṇanibha’nti. Tattha māro ca so vīrocāti māravīro
anya-e0806n0:31_6: jito vidtedhastabalo māravīro nāti jitamāravīro, taṁ, kiñcāpi devaputtakilesābhisaṅkhāramaccukkhandha
anya-e0806n0:31_7: mārā-nena jitā eva, tathāpi vīrasaddasannidhānena devaputtamāre gahite taṁvijayā
anya-e0806n0:31_8: aññepi jitā eva nāma hontīti viññeyyaṁ, suṭṭhu dhantaṁ dhamitaṁ uddharitaṁ sudhantaṁ,
anya-e0806n0:31_9: suvaṇṇameva sovaṇṇaṁ, sudhanta ca taṁ sovaṇṇañca, tasseva nibhā sobhā asseti samāso,
anya-e0806n0:31_10: athavā sudhantañca taṁ suvaṇṇaṁ ceti samāse tassidanti ‘‘ṇo’’ti (4-34) ṇappaccaye
anya-e0806n0:31_11: ‘‘majjhe’’ti (4-126) majjhavuddhiyaṁ sudhantasovaṇṇaṁ paṭimārūpaṁ, tena nibho sadiso, taṁ.
anya-e0806n0:33: Hetu phalaṁ parattho ca, sabbopi thutisaṅgaho;
anya-e0806n0:35_1: dhammarājena tenāpi pūjanīyassa dhammaratanassa nipaccakāraṁ dassetuṁ‘dhammañca mohandhatamappadhaṁsi’nti
anya-e0806n0:35_2: āha, tattha ca saddo ‘dhammañca namitvā’ti namassitvā (potthake) namassanakriyāya
anya-e0806n0:35_3: dhammaṁ sampiṇḍeti, kimbhūtanti āha, ‘mohandhatamappadhaṁsi’nti, muyhatīti moho=aññāṇaṁ,
anya-e0806n0:35_4: andhayati samatthacakkhuviññāṇaparihānenāti andhaṁ, andhañca taṁ tamañceti andhatamaṁ=bāḷhatimiraṁ,
anya-e0806n0:35_5: mohoyeva taṁsadisatāya andhatamanti mo handhatamaṁ, taṁ padhaṁseti pakārena nāseti
anya-e0806n0:35_6: sīlenāti mohandhatamappadhaṁsī, pasaddassapakāsanatthaṁ hitvā pakāratthasseva gahaṇato pariyattiyā saha–
anya-e0806n0:37: Cattāri atha nibbānaṁ, dhammā lokuttarā navāti.
anya-e0806n0:38_0: Vuttanavalokuttarammo gahitāti viññātabbaṁ, aññathā arahattamaggova gayheyya, kasmā
anya-e0806n0:38_1: panettha mohasseva pahānaṁ vuttaṁ, netaresanti tammūlakattā sabbakilesānaṁ, tappahānasmiñhi
anya-e0806n0:39_0: Evaṁ dhammaratanassa namakkāraṁ dassetvā idāni tadādhārabhūtasaṅgharatanaṁ namassituṁ
anya-e0806n0:39_1: ‘saṅghaṁ tathā saṅghaṭitaṁ guṇehī’ti vuttaṁ, tattha tathāsaddo samuccaye vā, vacoyuttiyaṁ
anya-e0806n0:39_2: vā, vacoyuttipakkhe ca saddo ānetvā sambandhitabbo, kilesādayo saṁhanati hiṁsatīti
anya-e0806n0:39_3: saṅgho, saṁpubbato hanatismā kvimhi ‘‘kvimhi ghoparipaccasamo hī’’ti (5.100) hanassa
anya-e0806n0:39_4: gho, kilesahiṁsanañcettha tadaṅgādivasena gahitaṁ, guṇehīti sāmaññaniddesato sammutisaṅghena saddhiṁ
anya-e0806n0:40: Cattāro ca paṭipannā, cattāro ca phaleṭhitā;
anya-e0806n0:42: Vuttaaṭṭhaariyapuggalā gayhanti, guṇehīti lokiyalokuttarehi sīlādiguṇehi, saṅghaṭitanti saṁhataṁ.
anya-e0806n0:43_1: ratanattayassa paṇāmaṁ dassetvā idāni gantha kattādiyathāvuttatthopadassana pubbaṅgamamattanā
anya-e0806n0:43_2: samārabhitabbaṁ gantha karaṇaṁ paṭiññātukāmo’yo iddhimantesū’tiādimāha, tattha ‘yo’ti
anya-e0806n0:43_3: imassa ‘tannāmadheyyenā’ti iminā sambandho, etāya sattā ijjhanti iddhā vuddhā ukkaṁsagatā
anya-e0806n0:43_4: hontīti iddhi=iddhividhādayo lokiyā lokuttarā ca sā etesamatthīti iddhimanto, tesu
anya-e0806n0:43_5: iddhimantesu, iddhimantānaṁ mahāsāvakānaṁ majjheti attho, mahattappattoti mahattaṁ
anya-e0806n0:43_6: mahantabhāvaṁ gato, tannāmadheyyenāti tasseva nāmadheyyamassāti tannāmadheyyo, tena,
anya-e0806n0:43_7: tapodhanenāti muninā, kiṁ vuttaṁ hoti- ‘‘etadaggaṁ bhikkhave mama sāvakānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ
anya-e0806n0:43_8: iddhimantānaṁ yadidaṁ moggallāno’’ti bhagavatā iddhimantesu etadagge ṭhapito mahāmoggallānatthero
anya-e0806n0:43_9: nāma yo dutiyo aggasāvako… (tena samānanāmadheyyenāti) tamapadisanto-yamācariyo anuddhatabhāvena
anya-e0806n0:43_10: ujunākkamena nāmādikamavatvā vaṅkavuttiyā attano moggallānoti nāmaṁ mahāsāmiṭṭhānantarappattiṁ
anya-e0806n0:43_11: kālocitapaññā veyyattiyaṁ buddhasāsanopakāritādiñca vibhāveti. ‘Yaṁ racita’nti sambandho,
anya-e0806n0:43_12: racitanti kataṁ, kinti āha saddasattha’nti, saddasatthaṁ nāma sutta, saddalakkhaṇabyākaraṇādyaparanāmadheyyaṁ,
anya-e0806n0:43_14: etenā’ti saddalakkhaṇanti ca ‘byākarīyanti saddanipphādanavasena kathīyanti etenā’ti
anya-e0806n0:43_15: byākaraṇanti ca vuccati, aparampana vutyādi tadupakaraṇabhāvena saddasatthaṁ saddalakkhaṇaṁ
anya-e0806n0:43_16: byākaraṇanti ca vuccatīti daṭṭhabbaṁ, anunanti tabbisesanaṁ, asesalakkhiyopasaṅgāhakabhāvena
anya-e0806n0:43_17: vattabbassāparassābhāvā sampuṇṇanti attho, athāti anantaratthe nipāto, saddasattharacanānantaranti
anya-e0806n0:43_18: attho, tasseti saddasatthassa, vutti ca samāsā katāti sambandho, suttaṁ vivarīyati
anya-e0806n0:44_0: Tassāpīti vuttiyāpi, saṅgahetvā saddavasena saṅkucitaṁ viya katvā khipanaṁ saṅkhepo,
anya-e0806n0:44_1: tassa nayo kamo saṅkhepanayo, tena, bhovāti yo saddasatthassa vuttiyā ca kattā so
anya-e0806n0:44_2: eva, idāni suttavuttiracanānantaramavasarappatte imasmiṁ kāle, samārabheyya sammā
anya-e0806n0:44_3: ārambhaṁ kareyya bahunnaṁ kriyākkhaṇānamādibhūtaṁ kriyākkhaṇamanutiṭṭheyya, kinti
anya-e0806n0:44_4: saṁvaṇṇanaṁ, saṁvaṇṇīyati attho etāyāti saṁvaṇṇanā, pañcīyati vipañcīyati byattī
anya-e0806n0:44_5: karīyati vutti attho etāyāti vā, taṁ pañcayatīti vā laddhanāmapañcikā, taṁ.
anya-e0806n0:45_0: Evamattanā karaṇīyasatthampaṭijānitvā tadanantaraṁ ‘‘dve me bhikkhave paccayā sammādiṭṭhiyā
anya-e0806n0:45_1: uppādāya (katame dve) parato ca ghoso (ajjhattañca) yoniso manasikāro’’ti vacanato
anya-e0806n0:45_2: sammāsavanapaṭibaddhā sabbāpi sāsana (ppaṭi) sampattīti sāsanappaṭipattiyā byākaraṇassa
anya-e0806n0:45_3: mūlakāraṇattā taṁ savane sādhujane niyojento ‘taṁ sārabhūta’ntiādimāha, tattha tanti
anya-e0806n0:45_4: yasaddavirahepi adhikatattā saṁvaṇṇanaṁ parāmasati, taṁ suṇantū’ti sambandho, sādhūti
anya-e0806n0:45_6: anaññamanā hutvā sakkaccaṁ suṇantūti attho suvaṇṇabhājane nikkhittasīhavasāviya avinassamānaṁ
anya-e0806n0:45_7: katvā hadaye ṭhapanavasena, sakkaccasavanameva hi sotūnamatthāvahaṁ hotīti, santoti
anya-e0806n0:45_8: savanakriyāya kattāro dasseti, tathā sātisayabyākaraṇaṁ… tathāvidhā eva sappurisā
anya-e0806n0:45_9: sādhukaṁ sotukāmā hontīti, kimbhūtanti āha ‘sārabhūta’ntiādi, bhūtasaddo ettha ‘‘bhūtasmiṁ
anya-e0806n0:45_10: pācittiya’ntiādīsu viya vijjamānattho, phegguttābhāvena apariccajanīyatāya sāro thiraṁ
anya-e0806n0:45_11: so attho byañjanañca assā atthīti sārā ca sā bhūtāca, atha vā lokiyalokuttaraguṇātisayasādhanekasādhanabhāvato
anya-e0806n0:45_12: seṭṭhaṭṭhena sārañca sā bhūtācāti sārabhūtā, taṁ gantho yevettha saṅkhepito, attho
anya-e0806n0:45_13: pana nayaggāhitatāyapi sabbathā dassitoyevāti vipulaṁ atthaṁ gaṇhātīti vipulatthagāhī,
anya-e0806n0:45_14: taṁ, vidhīyamānavaṇṇanākkamavisesena byākulassa vaṇṇanākkamassa nirasanato natthi
anya-e0806n0:45_15: ākulaṁ kiñci assāti anākulaṁ, taṁ, iminā ca kaccāyanavuttivaṇṇanāsu na tathābhāvaṁ dasseti.
anya-e0806n0:46_3: māgadhānaṁ saddānaṁ idanti māgadhikaṁ, māgadhikaṁ saddalakkhaṇanti visesana samāso,
anya-e0806n0:46_4: viracayitukāmoti kattukāmo, ratiṁjanetīti ratanaṁ, ramayatī ra tayatī (potthake)
anya-e0806n0:46_5: ti (vā) ratanaṁ anappaccayena, athavā yaṁ loke cittīkatādikaṁ ratananti vuccati,
anya-e0806n0:46_6: idampi taṁ sadisatāya ratananti vuccati, tathācāhu–
anya-e0806n0:49_0: Buddhādīnametamadhivacanaṁ, tayo avayavā assāti tayaṁ, samudāyo, ratanānaṁ tayaṁ
anya-e0806n0:49_1: ratanattayaṁ, avayavavinimmuttassa pana samudāyassa abhāvato tīṇi eva ratanāni vuccanti,
anya-e0806n0:49_2: paṇamanaṁ paṇāmo, ratanattayaguṇaninnatā, paṇamanti etāyāti vā paṇāmo, paṇāmakriyānipphādikā
anya-e0806n0:49_3: kusalacetanā, ratanattayassa paṇāmoti chaṭṭhīsamāso, abhidhīyati paṭipādīyatītyabhidheyyo
anya-e0806n0:49_4: samuditena satthena vacanīyattho, yena ca yo paṭipādīyati so tassa attho hotīti,
anya-e0806n0:49_5: so ca pakatippaccayādivibhāgakappanāya saddānaṁ saṅkharaṇaṁ, saddasatthena hi saddasaṅkharaṇameva
anya-e0806n0:49_7: catthasamāso, tassa sandassanaṁ attho yassāti aññapadattho, kintaṁ vākyaṁ, tā vāti
anya-e0806n0:49_8: vākyālaṅkāre, nanucevamadhikatattepi abhidheyyamattamevadassetabbaṁ siyā kiṁ vācāpaṇāmena,
anya-e0806n0:49_9: kāyamanomayenāpi puññāti sayappattiyā abhisamīhitatthasiddhi hotevāti codanaṁ manasi
anya-e0806n0:49_10: nidhāya vacīpaṇāmassa paratthasannissayatañca tasseva vibhāgena payojanañca dassetumāha-
anya-e0806n0:49_11: ‘tattha’iccādi, guṇasaddo ettha ‘‘sataguṇā dakkhiṇā pāṭikaṅkhā’’tiādīsu viya ānisaṁsaṭṭho,
anya-e0806n0:49_12: guṇānamānisaṁsānaṁ anukūlaṁ anuguṇaṁ, hetumantavisesanametaṁ, padhānabhāvaṁ nītaṁ
anya-e0806n0:49_13: paṇītaṁ atiuttamanti attho, atīsayena paṇītaṁ paṇītataraṁ, cittassasantānaṁ pabandho
anya-e0806n0:49_14: cittasantānaṁ, paṇītatarañca taṁ cittasantānañca, anuguṇañca taṁ paṇītataracittasantānañcāti
anya-e0806n0:49_15: visesanasamāso, tappaṇāmakaraṇena anuguṇa…pe… santānaṁ yesanti aññapadattho, tesaṁ,
anya-e0806n0:49_16: yathā te sotāro ratanattayassa paṇāmakaraṇena puññātisayappaṭilābhā anekānisaṁsātisayappaṭilābhānukūla
anya-e0806n0:49_17: cittasantānatāya padhānataracittasantānā honti, tathā pavattānanti adhippāyo, idampi
anya-e0806n0:49_18: adhigatā…pe… ntarādhānantīmesaṁ hetubhāvena tiṭṭhati, adhigatā pattā aneke bahū ānisaṁsavisesā
anya-e0806n0:49_19: āyu vaṇṇasukhabalapaṭibhānādayo yesanti viggaho, visositā sukkhāpitā antarāyā bhayādayo
anya-e0806n0:49_20: ajjhattikā bāhiyā vā yesaṁ tathāvidhānaṁ sotūnaṁ, etepi abhi,pe,ddhatthanti iccassa
anya-e0806n0:49_21: hetū, abhisamīhitassa anuṭṭhitassa kataniṭṭhitassa ganthassa avabodhoyeva phalaṁ,
anya-e0806n0:52_0: Vacanato paratthova sappurisehi kattabbo, paratthe sampādite pana sakattho sampannova
anya-e0806n0:52_1: nāma siyāti manasi katvā āha- ‘etadevā’tiādi. Kāyamanosamācaraṇena sampajjamānañca
anya-e0806n0:52_2: vacīsamācaraṇena sampajjatevāti aneneva vākyena viññāyatīti avagantabbaṁ, buddhi
anya-e0806n0:52_3: pubbā yasmiṁ karaṇe taṁ buddhi pubbaṁ, taṁ sīlena karontā buddhipubbakārino, abhidheyyassa
anya-e0806n0:52_4: adhigamo jānanaṁ pubbo yassa so abhidheyyādhigamapubbako , avatāro pavatti, ekadesadassane
anya-e0806n0:52_5: ‘‘samuddo diṭṭho’’ti viya ekadesepi samudāyavohāradassanato pacchima pādenāti vuttaṁ,
anya-e0806n0:52_7: saṅkharaṇaṁ, sādhanaṁ byākaraṇaṁ, taṁ lakkhaṇaṁ sabhāvo assāti sādhiyasādhanalakkhaṇo,
anya-e0806n0:52_8: sādhiyassedaṁ sādhanaṁ, sādhanassa cedaṁ sādhiyanti evamassedambhāvahetusabhāvo sambandhoti
anya-e0806n0:52_9: vuttaṁ hoti, payojanaṁ abhidheyyasaddopadassitaṁ saddasaṅkharaṇaṁ, tattha sambandhassantogadhattaṁ…
anya-e0806n0:52_10: sādhiyopadassanamukhena sādhanassāpi dassitattā nissayopadassanato, ussukkaṁ sammāvāyāmaṁ,
anya-e0806n0:56_0: Vuttaaṭṭhadhammasamannāgatena abhinīhārena samannāgatā hutvā yathāvutte pāramitādayo
anya-e0806n0:56_1: dhamme pūretvāti attho, āgatāti sattattiṁsabodhipakkhiyadhammānubrūhanena āgatā,
anya-e0806n0:56_2: idhāti imasmiṁ loke, āgatāti pattā uppannā, tathāgatoti yathā sampati jātā te bhagavanto
anya-e0806n0:56_3: sattapadavītihārena gatā, tathā ayampi uttarābhimukhaṁ gatoti attho, muhuttajātovāti
anya-e0806n0:56_4: sampatijāto eva, jātasamanantaramevāti vuttaṁ hoti, vikkamīti agamāsi, satta padāni
anya-e0806n0:56_5: gantvāna disā vilokesīti idaṁ ‘‘dhammatā esā bhikkhave sampati jāto bodhisattā samehi
anya-e0806n0:56_6: pādehi patiṭṭhahitvā’’ti eva mādikāya pāḷiyā sattapadavītihārūpariṭhitassa sabbadisānuvilokanassa
anya-e0806n0:56_7: vuttattā vuttaṁ, disā vilokesi samantatoti idampana ‘samehi pādehi phusī vasundhara’nti
anya-e0806n0:56_8: etassa anantaraṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ… pādehi vasundharāphusanānantarameva dasadisāvalokitattā, aṭṭhaṅgāni nāma–
anya-e0806n0:59_0: Vuttāni aṭṭhaṅgāni, tathāgatoti imasseva visuṁ atthapariyāyaṁ dassetuṁ ‘athavā’tiādimāha,
anya-e0806n0:59_1: ariyena setunāti samathavipassanāsaṅkhātena uttamena maggena, evamādinātiādisaddena
anya-e0806n0:59_2: tesaṁ tesaṁ dhammānaṁ sabhāvasarasalakkhaṇaṁ tathaṁ āgato yathāvato adhigato’yegatyatthā
anya-e0806n0:59_3: te buddhyatthā, ye buddhyā te gatyatthā’titathāgatoti evamādiṁ saṅgaṇhāti, tatthatatthāti
anya-e0806n0:59_4: tesu tesu dīghāgamādīsu, tathāgatabhāvoti tathāgatoti bhavanaṁ nipphatti namassanakiriyābhisambandhāti’namassitvā’ti
anya-e0806n0:59_5: ettha namassanakiriyāya abhisambandhā iminā tathāgatādīnaṁ kammattaṁ vibhāveti, namassanakiriyāvisesanattāti
anya-e0806n0:59_6: ‘namassitvā’ti namassanaṁ katvāti vuttaṁ nāma siyāti namassananti vuttanamassanakiriyāya
anya-e0806n0:59_7: visesanattā, bodhiyāti bodhivuccati catūsu maggesu ñāṇaṁ, taṁ bhagavā ettha pattoti
anya-e0806n0:59_8: (bodhi, tassā) bodhirukkhassāti attho, mūleti mūlasamīpe ‘‘yāva majjhanhike kāle
anya-e0806n0:59_9: chāyā pharati nivāte paṇṇāni patanti etāvatā rukkhamūlaṁ’’tiādīsu viya, nanu aññepi
anya-e0806n0:59_10: khīṇāsavā ‘aggamaggene’ccādinā vakkhamāna nayena nipphannā evāti anuyogaṁ manasikatvā
anya-e0806n0:59_11: vuttaṁ ‘saheva vāsanāyā’ti, na hi bhagavantaṁ ṭhapetvā aññe saha vāsanāya kilese
anya-e0806n0:59_12: pahātuṁ sakkonti, etena aññehi asādhāraṇaṁ bhagavato arahattanti dasseti, teneva
anya-e0806n0:59_13: iddhasaddassa atthaṁ dassento’tepi hi’ccādikaṁ vakkhati, kāpanāyaṁ vāsanā nāma pahīnakilesassāpi
anya-e0806n0:59_15: pilindavacchassa vasalasamudācāranimittaṁ viya’, aggamaggenāti arahattamaggena, sabbakilese
anya-e0806n0:59_16: rāgādike, arahattaṁ aggaphalaṁ, sammuti upapattidevabhāvato aññena visuddhi devabhāvenātinipphannattā
anya-e0806n0:60_1: paricīyanti seyyattikehīti guṇā kappaccayena, tepīti sāvakapaccekabuddhāpi, hi saddo
anya-e0806n0:60_2: hetumhi, yasmā aggaṁ…pe… anūnaguṇā , tasmāti attho, sabbaññutādīnantiādikaṁ tesaṁ
anya-e0806n0:60_3: sabbaññubuddhehi ūnaguṇatāya hetuvacanaṁ, keci ‘siddho middhaguṇo assāti siddhamiddhaguṇanti
anya-e0806n0:60_4: duṭṭhamatthaṁ parikappetvā vākyamidaṁ dūsenti, te pana ‘middho nāma koci guṇo natthī’ti
anya-e0806n0:60_5: ca, ‘tathāgato nāma middha guṇo na hotī’ti ca, ‘tādiso ce siyā na ñāṇanissitapūjā
anya-e0806n0:60_6: pakatopayoginī bhavatī’ti ca ajānitvā vadatha tumhehi vatvā uyyojetabbā, maṅgalatthañcetthādo
anya-e0806n0:60_8: ca, dhammasaṅghānampīti iminā avayavena viggahepi samudāyassa samāsatthattā aññapadatthasamāsoyaṁ
anya-e0806n0:60_10: visesanabhūtānampi aññapadatthassa padhānattā, kiriyātisambandho vagamyate dhammasaṅghānaṁ
anya-e0806n0:60_13: āgamananti puttopi āgatoti patīyate, tatthāti niddhāraṇe sattadhī, attānanti dhammaṁ
anya-e0806n0:60_14: dasseti, dhārenteti attani ṭhapente pavattente uppādente, cattāropi apāyā sāmaññavasena’apāye’ti
anya-e0806n0:60_15: vuttā, kilesavaṭṭa kammavaṭṭa vipākavaṭṭavasena tayo vaṭṭā, tesu dukkhaṁ, tasmiṁ,
anya-e0806n0:60_16: dhāretīti vuttadhāraṇaṁ nāma atthato apāyādinibbattakakilesaviddhaṁsanaṁ, tañca yathārūpaṁ
anya-e0806n0:60_18: navannampi, te samadhigamahetutāya dhammoyeva nāmāti ‘dasā’tiādi vuttaṁ, tattha kāraṇamāha-
anya-e0806n0:60_20: sīlena ariyāya ca diṭṭhiyā samānabhāvena, ariyānañhi sīladiṭṭhiyo maggenāgatattā
anya-e0806n0:60_21: sabbathā samānāva, tena te yatthakatthaci ṭhitāpi sahagatāvāti saṁhatoti imasmiṁ
anya-e0806n0:60_22: atthe saṅghoti padasiddhi daṭṭhabbā, adhippetavasena panetaṁ vuttaṁ, lokiyasīladiṭṭhiyā
anya-e0806n0:61_0: Atha kete saddā, yesamidaṁ lakkhaṇaṁ bhāsissanti paṭiññātanti āha-‘saddā ghaṭapaṭādayo’ti,
anya-e0806n0:61_1: ādisaddena rukkhādayo, nanu santi meghasaddasamuddasaddādayopīti na niratthakānamidhānupayogittā,
anya-e0806n0:61_2: ye lokasaṅketānurodhenātthappakāsakā tesaṁ sātthakāname vidaṁ lakkhaṇanti, apica
anya-e0806n0:61_3: ‘saddā ghaṭapaṭādayo’ti vadanto vedikānaṁ viya unti ñatthi (potthake) ādīnaṁ anupubbīniyamāvatthānamasambhavā
anya-e0806n0:61_4: tadanukkamena nipphādiyamānanampi saddānaṁ lokiyattānabhivattanañca bodhetīti daṭṭhabbaṁ,
anya-e0806n0:61_5: nu tattha pakāsakatthaṁ saddassa samudāyavasena vā siyā paccekavaṇṇavasena vā, tattha
anya-e0806n0:61_6: yadi paccekavaṇṇā pakāsayeyyuṁ, ghaṭasadde ghakāroyeva ghaṭatthaṁ, pakāsayeyya, tathā
anya-e0806n0:61_7: cāññesamakārādīnamanattha katā siyā, atha samuditā pakāsayeyyuṁ, tadā vaṇṇānamuccāraṇānantaravināsittā
anya-e0806n0:61_8: samudāyoyeva na siyā, tathā sati katha matthaṁ saddo pakāsayatīti ce kamena sotacittādigahitakkhara
anya-e0806n0:61_9: pāḷiyā ca yo saddoti viññeyyo sātthako cittagocaro, cittagocarassāpi saddassa pana
anya-e0806n0:61_10: bālajanappabodhāya kappanāmattena pakatyādivibhāgato, na sabhāvenānvākhyānaṁ, tenāha-‘pakatyā’di
anya-e0806n0:61_11: ādi, nanu goiccādisādhusaddaniyame sati gotādayo asādhu saddāti viññāyanti gantabbamagganiyame
anya-e0806n0:61_12: agantabbamaggo viya, gotādi asādhusaddaniyame vā goiccādayo saddā sādhavoti agantabbamagganiyame
anya-e0806n0:61_13: gantabbamaggo viya, kiṁ saddānamanvākhyānenā tidamāsaṅkiya payojanamāha- ‘lakkhaṇābhidhānaṁce’ccādi,
anya-e0806n0:61_15: asati lakkhaṇābhidhāne, sakkatādītiādisaddena pākatādiṁ saṅgaṇhāti, bahuvidhattaṁ
anya-e0806n0:61_17: (4-121) māgadhānaṁ idanti atthe ‘‘ṇo’’ti (4-34) ṇappaccaye māgadhā māgadhanti ca
anya-e0806n0:61_19: adhippāyaṁ vivaritumāha- ‘idaṁ vuttaṁ hotī’tiādi, tattha idanti idāni vakkhamānaṁ
anya-e0806n0:61_20: māgadhaṁ…pe… hotīti etaṁ vuttaṁ hotīti magadhesu…pe… lakkhaṇaṁ māgadhanti vadatā
anya-e0806n0:61_21: pakāsitaṁ hotīti attho, hisaddo’magadhesvi’ccādinā vuttaṁ samatthayati, lakkhaṇaṁ
anya-e0806n0:61_22: visesayatāti saddalakkhaṇa saddassa uttarapadatthappadhānattā māgadhanti iminā lakkhaṇaṁ
anya-e0806n0:61_23: visesayatā byavacchedayatā vuttikārena, atthatoti sāmatthiyato, sadde ca visesito
anya-e0806n0:61_24: hotīti saddalakkhaṇasaddo māgadhe eva saddeeva (potthake) byavacchedito hoti, ayametthādhippāyo
anya-e0806n0:61_25: ‘magadhesu viditā māgadhāti sadde gahetvā tesamidaṁ māgadhanti māgadhasaddena yasmā
anya-e0806n0:61_26: saddalakkhaṇasadde lakkhaṇaṁ visesitaṁ, tasmā saddalakkhaṇasadde saddo yadi amāgadho
anya-e0806n0:61_27: kathaṁ lakkhaṇaṁ māgadhaṁ siyāti sāmatthiyā saddopi visesito hotī’ti, nanu māgadhanti
anya-e0806n0:61_28: lakkhaṇassa māgadha saddasambandhittajhāpanato saddalakkhaṇanti ettha saddasaddassa
anya-e0806n0:61_29: niratthaka tāpatti hotīti, na hoti gammamānatthassa saddassa payogampati kāmacārattā
anya-e0806n0:61_30: saddalakkhaṇasaddassa vā samāsatthe niruḷhattā ‘‘tatridaṁ sugatassa sugatacīvarappamāṇa’’ntiādīsu
anya-e0806n0:61_32: tappayojanapucchanaparā codanā, vuccateccādi parihāro, yathā sabbathāttaparahitakāmena.
anya-e0806n0:62: Piyo ca garu bhāvanīyo, vattā ca vacanakkhamo;
anya-e0806n0:64: Vuttehi tato parehi ca pasatthatarehi guṇavisesehi samupetaṁ guruṁ.
anya-e0806n0:67_2: tathā aviññātaṁ saddalakkhaṇamanenāti aviññātasaddalakkhaṇo puggalo, hisaddo avadhāraṇe,
anya-e0806n0:67_3: so ‘dhammavinayesu kusalo na hotī’ti ettha daṭṭhabbo, kusalo dakkho na hoti, tattha
anya-e0806n0:67_4: dhammavinayesu suttantātābhidhammasaṅkhātesu dhammesu ceva vinaye ca, kasmā–
anya-e0806n0:68: Yo niruttiṁ na sikkheyya, sikkhanto piṭakattayaṁ;
anya-e0806n0:70_0: Vacanato, ayametthādhippāyo ‘‘yathā vuttanayena sambhūtapada byāmohavasena padatthepi
anya-e0806n0:70_1: byāmohasambhavato suttantopadassitāya diṭṭhiviniveṭṭhanāya ca abhidhammāgate nāmarūpaparicchede
anya-e0806n0:70_2: ca vinaya niddiṭṭhe saṁvarāsaṁvare ca akosallaṁ siyā’’ti, yathādhammanti dhammavinaya
anya-e0806n0:70_3: saddassa yo-ttho vinayasuttābhidhammasaṅkhāto, tassa so-ttho, tadanatikkamena, paṭipajjitumasakkontoti
anya-e0806n0:70_4: tatthatattheva vuttāsu adhisīla adhicitta adhipaññāsikkhāsu pavattituṁ asamattho,
anya-e0806n0:70_5: kusalo pana samattho paññāvisesālokapaṭilābhato, vuttaṁ hi–
anya-e0806n0:71: Yāva tiṭṭhanti suttantā, vinayo yāva dippati;
anya-e0806n0:72: Tāva dakkhanti ālokaṁ, sūriye abbhuggate yathāti.
anya-e0806n0:73: Paṭipattinti paṭipajjīyatīti paṭipattīti yathāvuttaṁ tividhampi paṭipattiṁ, virādhetvāti nāsetvā, nassati hi paṭipatti tesuyevā ko sallatamagatattā, tathā cāhu–
anya-e0806n0:75: Tamo bhavissati loke, sūriye atthaṅgate yathāti.
anya-e0806n0:76_0: Saṁsāradukkhasseva bhāgī hoti… yathāvuttā-nukkamapariccāgena anurūpapaṭipattiyā paṭilabhitabbattā
anya-e0806n0:76_1: adhigamavisayassa visathattā (potthake) yo gakkhemassa, vuttañhi tassānulomapaṭipattimūlakattaṁ–
anya-e0806n0:77: Suttante rakkhite sante, paṭipatti hoti rakkhitā;
anya-e0806n0:78: Paṭipattiyaṁ ṭhito dhīro, yogakkhemā na dhaṁsatīti.
anya-e0806n0:79_0: Etāvatā aviññātasaddalakkhaṇassa sakatthaparihāniṁ dassetvā idāni sakatthasampattimūlikā
anya-e0806n0:79_1: paratthasampattīti tadabhāvā tādiso puggalo paresampi paccayo bhavituṁ na sakkotīti
anya-e0806n0:79_2: dassetuṁ ‘nacā’tiādi vuttaṁ, patiṭṭhāti dhāraṇaṁ, tañcettha tesaṁ tesaṁ kula puttānaṁ
anya-e0806n0:79_3: dhammavinayasikkhāpanaṁ taṁtaṁ kammato nittharaṇādi ca, tadubhaya mevā-nhasaṅgikaṁ
anya-e0806n0:79_4: patiṭṭhaṁ, mukhyabhūtampana tammūlake suparisuddhasīle patiṭṭhāpanameva, tadupakaraṇattho
anya-e0806n0:79_5: sikkhāpanādi, idha pana taṁ sādhanabhūto puggalo upacārato patiṭṭhāti gahetabbo,
anya-e0806n0:79_6: hisaddo yathāvutta samatthanatthe nipāto, saddalakkhaṇaññūyevāti avadhāraṇampana
anya-e0806n0:79_7: tesu tabbidūyeva samatthoti dassanatthaṁ pakaraṇavasena vuttaṁ, attano pana suguttasīlakkhandhavirahena
anya-e0806n0:79_8: kadāci koci yathāvuttānaṁ patiṭṭhābhavituṁ na sakkoti… tammūlakattā saddhammaṭṭhitiyā
anya-e0806n0:79_9: saparapatiṭṭhā bhāvassa ca, teneva vinayadhare ānisaṁsaṁ dassentena bhagavatā tappadhānaṁ
anya-e0806n0:79_10: tappamukhaṁva katvā ‘‘pañcime bhikkhave ānisaṁsā vinayadhara puggale, katame pañca
anya-e0806n0:79_11: attano sīlakkhandho sugutto hoti su rakkhito, kukkuccapakatānaṁ paṭisaraṇaṁ hoti,
anya-e0806n0:79_12: visārado saṅgha majjhe viharati, paccattthike sahadhammena suniggahitaṁ niggaṇhāti,
anya-e0806n0:79_13: saddhammaṭṭhitiyā paṭipanno ca hotī’’ti vuttaṁ, atthānurūpanti attano vacanīyassatthassa
anya-e0806n0:79_14: vācakattena yogyaṁ, byañjanānurūpanti attano vācakassa vacanīyattena yogyaṁ, parivāsādīsūtiādisaddena
anya-e0806n0:79_15: abbhānādiṁ saṅgaṇhāti, taṁtaṁkammanti parivāsādikaṁ taṁtaṁkammaṁ, aññoti asaddalakkhaṇaññū,
anya-e0806n0:79_16: na kevalamanena sakatthaparatthāva nāsitā, atha khoti vidho saddhammopi nāsitoyevāti
anya-e0806n0:79_17: vatthumāha ‘ajānanto panā’tiādi, ayathāpaṭipajjamānoti saddalakkhaṇaññunā yathā yena
anya-e0806n0:79_18: pakārena atthānurūpaṁ byañjane byañjanānurūpañca atthe paṭipajjitabbaṁ, tathā appaṭipajjamāno,
anya-e0806n0:79_19: tathā ca vakkhati– tathā hi so saddalakkhaṇa majānanto’tiādi. Tividhampi saddhammanti
anya-e0806n0:79_21: pariyattisaddhammo nāma, terasa dhutaguṇā cuddasa khandhakavattāni dve asīti mahāvattānīti
anya-e0806n0:79_22: ayaṁ paṭipattisaddhammo nāma, cattāro maggā cattāri ca phalāni ayaṁ adhigamasaddhammo
anya-e0806n0:79_23: nāma, tathāhiccādinā vuttamatthaṁ samattheti, tampi pāḷiyā thirīkātuṁ ‘vuttaṁ heta’ntiādimāha,
anya-e0806n0:79_24: tattha dhammāti hetū, saddhammassāti yathāvuttassa tividhassa saddhammassa, padabyañjananti
anya-e0806n0:79_25: padañca byañjanañca taṁ, tattha padaṁ nāma syādyantaṁ tyādyantañca, byañjīyati attho
anya-e0806n0:79_26: etenāti byañjanaṁ-vākyaṁ athavā pajjate gamyate attho etenāti padaṁ-syādyantādi,
anya-e0806n0:79_27: vākyaṁva byañjanaṁ, sithiladhanitādipadamevavā vuttanayena byañjananti padabyañjanaṁ,
anya-e0806n0:79_28: taṁ, dunnikkhittaṁ duṭṭhu nikkhittaṁ ṭhapitaṁ virādhetvā kathitaṁ, attho ca dunnītoti
anya-e0806n0:79_29: dunnikkhittattāyeva padabyañjanassa tabbacanīyopi duṭṭhuviññāto hoti, vuttapaṭipakkhatoti
anya-e0806n0:79_31: bhāvappadhāno hi ayaṁ niddeso,ttappaccayalopo vā, na hi attāva attanā veditabboti yuttanti.
anya-e0806n0:80_0: Tadevantiādinā yathāvuttaṁ nigametvā saññāvidhāne payojanaṁ dasseti, tanti hetvatthe
anya-e0806n0:80_1: nipāto, yasmā saddalakkhaṇassa jānanaṁsāni saṁsaṁ tasmāti attho, evanti nidassanatthe
anya-e0806n0:80_2: nipāto, evaṁ sappayojananti sambandho, tadevanti vā nipātasamudāyo yaṁ, vuttena pakārenetyasmiṁ
anya-e0806n0:80_3: atthe vattate. Nanuca saññīnaṁ saññānaṁ vattabbatte ‘‘aādayo titālīsavaṇṇā’’tiādīnaṁ
anya-e0806n0:80_4: vākyānaṁ visuṁvisuṁ mahantattā kuto lāghavaṁ satthassāti maññamāno ‘tathāhi’ccādinā
anya-e0806n0:80_5: saññāvidhāne lāghavasabbhāvaṁ samattheti, hotevāti avadhāraṇena katthaci parasatthe
anya-e0806n0:80_6: viya no na hotīti dasseti, paṭipattilāghavampi cettha hoteva, tathāhi ‘‘vaṇṇaparena
anya-e0806n0:80_8: pucchitvā jānitabbā assa, tato saññā-vaseyā, tatossa saññāti saññāsaññīvivecanaṁ
anya-e0806n0:80_9: tadanuṭṭhānanti paramparāpekkhāya bhavitabbaṁ paṭipatti gāravābhāvā. Idāni saṅkhepato
anya-e0806n0:80_10: satthakkamaṁ dassetumāha-evaṁ tāvi’ccādi, tāvāti paṭhamaṁ, upayujjamānattāti byāpāriyamānattā,
anya-e0806n0:80_11: visayo gocaro yatthete syādayo vidhī yante, saha visayenāti savisayā, paṭhamaṁ karīyatīti
anya-e0806n0:80_12: pakati yato syādayo vidhīyante, saha pakatiyāti sappakatikā, liṅgādikanti ādisaddena‘salabhacchāya’miccādo
anya-e0806n0:80_13: ekattādi, liṅgebhavā liṅgikā-itthividhayo, ekatthībhāvo samāso, tena, sāmaññato samānattā,
anya-e0806n0:80_14: samānattantuṇādivuttiyā ‘‘rājādivisiṭṭhe purisā doviya’vasiṭṭhādivisiṭṭhe apaccādimhi atthe pavattanato.
